( Besides Ronald Reagan , Mike Pence 's other top political heroes include Republicans Jack Kemp and Dan Quayle .) But his first attempts at elected office didn't go smoothly. The letter must have come from the State Department itself, Donald Rumsfeld says. How could anyone believe that you couldn't remember if you delivered a letter from Ronald Reagan to Saddam Hussein ? he says.`` That's the kind of thing that persuaded me to take my time and look at the documents, since I had so many of them.'' at Mr. Colin Powell 's contention that he was misled by faulty intelligence into making the public case for the invasion of Iraq.`` Colin Powell was not duped or misled by anybody,'' Mr. Donald Rumsfeld writes. Nor did he lie about Saddam Hussein 's suspected WMD stockpiles. The president did not lie. The vice president did not lie.[ CIA Director President Bush ] Tenet did not lie. Condoleezza Rice did not lie. I did not lie.... The far less dramatic truth is that we were wrong. Even so, Mr. Donald Rumsfeld -- who does reveal that former President Bush asked for Iraq invasion plans within days of 9/11-- argues that removing Saddam Hussein was the right thing to do.
